signals 0.11.0-SNAPSHOT API

The MATSim contrib for traffic lights is able to simulate traffic signals microscopically.

See: Description

tutorial.fixedTimeSignals  
tutorial.simpleResponsiveSignalEngine  
The MATSim contrib for traffic lights is able to simulate traffic signals microscopically. For fixed-time control a default implementation is provided. No programming is required to simulate fixed-time traffic signal control. Traffic-responsive signal control needs custom implementation but can benefit from the provided infrastructure.

As a starting point please have a look at the tutorials in this contrib and the tutorial in the matsim main distribution.

For more information and documentation see here.
